articles.title: Russia confirms broken ties with European rights court - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: The Russian parliament has passed a set of laws allowing Moscow not to comply with the top European human rights court’s rulings.
articles.content:
The Russian parliament has passed a set of laws allowing Moscow not to comply with the top European human rights court’s rulings.

articles.title: European Union rules all smartphones will require the same charger from 2024, forcing Apple to change its iPhone connector - ABC News
articles.description: Apple will have to change the connector on iPhones sold in Europe by 2024 after European Union politicians agree on a single mobile charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras.

articles.author: Loni Prinsloo
articles.title: Govt ‘taken aback’ by Ryanair’s Afrikaans quiz policy - News24
articles.description: South Africa’s government said it’s “taken aback” by European low-cost airline Ryanair’s decision to force an Afrikaans test on travellers to prevent the use of fraudulent passports.
